segments.text: That two-step stool under the boy looks extremely unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, tilted at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backward in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched so high, his body is off-balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His quest for cookies is making him take quite the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing nearby doesn't seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's too focused on the potential sugary payout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is just an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me incredibly anxious just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily fall and hit his head on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or drop the cookie jar, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of it makes my stomach clench.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can he be so oblivious to his own precarious position?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn him about the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sight is genuinely making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
